channel.title: Cbow using rune arrows..?
channel.description:
ok well i have a
rune 'cbow in my server but u need rune arrows as arrows...
how do i change it so u need dragon bolts or rune bolts??
because i have rune c'bow in my server its just that u need rune arrows as arrows -.-
how do i change?

item.title: Cbow using rune arrows..?
item.dc:creator: @i_owned_u_ha i owned u ha
item.description:
@i_owned_u_ha wrote:

omg stop spamming and flaming i just wanna know the answer -.-

plz

Read full topic

item.title: Cbow using rune arrows..?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

[quote=“For ( ; ; ), post:5, topic:174424”][quote author=Reforced link=topic=234860.msg2003583#msg2003583 date=1200709414]

then that’s odd, cause you can normally use any arrows in any bows.

Don’t post enless you know the answer to his question … spammer …
[/quote]

Exactly don’t post unless you know the answer Reforced.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { // id of c bow if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] != ####) { // id of bolts sendMessage("You need bolts to fire a crossbow."); ResetAttack(); // or ResetAttackNPC(); depending on which method } }[/quote]

Exactly don’t post unless you want to know the wrong answer right answer quote double quote full stop.

Read full topic

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { // id of c bow if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] != ####) { // id of bolts sendMessage("You need bolts to fire a crossbow."); ResetAttack(); // or ResetAttackNPC(); depending on which method } }
